Posts.EditableText: Hello! I want to create an rpg game where the player would feel like a part of the reality and I was wondering if there is any way for me to do something so the players could write their names and the characters would call them by their name whole time?
Posts.HTML: Hello! I want to create an rpg game where the player would feel like a part of the reality and I was wondering if there is any way for me to do something so the players could write their names and the characters would call them by their name whole time?

Posts.EditableText:
Something like this:
```
msg ("So, what shall I call you?")
get input {
  player.alias = result
  msg ("Hi {player.alias}, how are you today?")
}
````
